text.en: Homage to the Guru and Three Jewels!
text.en-trans: lama dang könchok sum la chaktsal lo

text.en: May I, in each and every one of my lives to come,
text.en-trans: dak ni kyé zhing kyewa tamché du

text.en: Gain a precious human form, free and well-favoured,
text.en-trans: daljor milü rinchen tob gyur né

text.en: And thereafter may I encounter sublime spiritual guides
text.en-trans: shenyen dampa nam dang jalwa dang

text.en: And continuously apply myself to the sacred Dharma.
text.en-trans: taktu dampé chö la chöpar shok

text.en: May I never cling to the pleasures of ordinary existence,
text.en-trans: sipé dé la namyang ma chak shing

text.en: Nor become attached to the extreme of an inferior nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: nyangdé menpé ta la ang mazhenpar

text.en: Instead, for the sake of all beings as numerous as space is vast,
text.en-trans: khanyam semchen kün gyi dön gyi chir

text.en: May I strive to accomplish unsurpassed awakening.
text.en-trans: lamé changchub drub la tsönpar shok

text.en: Having realized the ultimate beyond conceptual limitations
text.en-trans: döndam tröpé ta dang dralwa dang

text.en: And the illusory nature of the relative,
text.en-trans: kündzob gyuma tabur tok gyur né

text.en: May I never be distracted even for so much as an instant
text.en-trans: kechik tsam yang yelwa mepar ni

text.en: As I diligently strive to take this profound truth to heart.
text.en-trans: zab dön nyam su len la tsönpar shok

text.en: Even in this very life, may I reject all that is unwholesome
text.en-trans: tsé di nyi la ang mi gé kün pong zhing

text.en: And constantly strive to apply the virtuous Dharma.
text.en-trans: taktu gewé chö la rabtu tsön

text.en: May all my actions of body, speech and mind
text.en-trans: dü nam taktu go sum chöpa nam

text.en: Always be devoted solely to others' well-being!
text.en-trans: zhen la penpé döndu gyurwar shok

text.en: When it's time to let go of this life,
text.en-trans: tséyi dujé tongwar gyurpa na

text.en: May the force of my faith and aspiration
text.en-trans: nubchok dewachen gyi zhingkham su

text.en: Carry me to the western paradise of Sukhāvatī,
text.en-trans: dé dang dünpé shuk kyi lek drö né

text.en: There to be guided by Amitābha in his compassion.
text.en-trans: öpakmé pé tukjé jedzin shok
